meanings.definition: The quality or state of being nervous or easily agitated.
meanings.sent1: Her nervinesses showed when she couldn't stop fidgeting during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: His nervinesses often led to him overthinking simple tasks.
meanings.sent3: Despite her nervinesses, she managed to stay calm during the storm.
meanings.sent4: The nervinesses in the room were palpable as everyone awaited the exam results.
meanings.sent5: The cat's nervinesses were evident as it cautiously approached the unfamiliar object.

meanings.definition: The tendency to be bold or audacious in behavior.
meanings.sent1: His nervinesses shone through when he volunteered to lead the risky project.
meanings.sent2: The comedian's nervinesses on stage captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: With a touch of nervinesses, he decided to ask his crush out on a date.
meanings.sent4: Her nervinesses in negotiation made her a formidable opponent.
meanings.sent5: The nervinesses of the young entrepreneur impressed the seasoned investors.
